website_summaries.verdict: A durable, well-made sandbox that is edged out of our top spot only by the versatile Badger Basket model.
pros: Manufactured with reinforced wood panels for durability
Lots of room for several children and have hours of play
cons: Takes up a lot of yard space
Similar to the Badger Basket sandbox but doesn't come with a canopy

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it is pinewood and it may not last ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is pinewood and it may not last forever. But it is worth the money. My kid is three and he loves it! The box is big enough to keep him busy. No playgrounds with sandboxes in the neighborhood, so this one is a lifesaver. I bought an extra tarp to keep it clean and dry when not in use. The only challenge is filling all that volume. 900 pounds of sand!!! This is what you see in my photo. This sandbox builds your stamina! As for the assembly, it was very straightforward. I've read a few reviews back here, so I made sure I copied the numbers on the box just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Alex T

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. We used 14 of the 50lb play sand bags to fill it. Our kids are almost 3 and 20 months and have enjoyed playing. Make sure you keep a record of the batch number. It should be on the box and instructions. One of our seats cracked within a month of putting the sandbox together and Kidkraft customer service gave us the runaround for a couple days before they'd send a replacement since we didn't have the batch number.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D.

customer_reviews.title: Think Twice
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it does not have a good weather sealant on it, so after just one summer it is faded and looks as if it is getting weathered. The cover was a real disappointment we had to build one out of wood and the plastic sheet that is used for the bottom is easily punctured and the grass grows in between the sandbox and the plastic. The plastic pieces used to hold the plastic bottom onto the sandbox are very cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Marie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Solid wood
customer_reviews.text: Nice Solid wood, big enough for mom + both kids (or dad +1). Holds plenty of sand and was easy to put together. Only con is that @ 5 ft wide, you cannot get a piece of plywood to cover over it for the winter. I had to splice 2 pieces together to make a solid winter cover. Maybe a 6ft x 4ft option would have been better (but not square :s)
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Kids are happy so are we
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases we have made for the kids. Assembly took less than a hour and we sealed it with an oil based sealer. We filled this with 16 bags of sand(50LB each) and there is still room to add more. Kids love this and they out playing in it as I write this review.Budget about 50$ for the sand if you plan to get play sand from Lowe's or HD.
customer_reviews.author: Ranjith

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall - a good buy for the price. I have this in my backyard in Colorado. Warm summers & cold winders. I have had it for about a year. My kids enjoy it. The cover is a bit of a pain to put on and take off (takes time to tie everything). So far it has been sturdy. Took about 1/2 ton of sand if I recall correctly. (~$80 in sand). I have noticed it is starting to show some wear on the seats - a little cracking etc.
customer_reviews.author: John Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for young kids age 2 to 10
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift for our grand children. I found it easy to put together with no special tools needed to assemble it. The materials are substantial, fit together well, and of good quality. After 6 months outside and much use by two over active grand children, it remains in excellent condition. The cover keeps out unwanted animal activity.
customer_reviews.author: cww1950

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backyard sandbox
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and his friends to have some sand fun (in the shade) since we don't get to the beach as much as we should. It is the perfect size for him to play in alone with his ride on excavator or with a friend or 2. Plenty of room so they're not on top of each other. I fit in there pretty with him. He loves it. My husband and I out it together in about 15 minutes...super easy but sturdy and they give you labeled extra parts (just in case.) $5 bags of play sand from Lowe's and we have a playground quality addition to our back yard play space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap wood
customer_reviews.text: Wood is cheap and not treated enough. The wooden seats cracked and split apart after just 4 months of light use. Once split, it leaves an exposed screw that is dangerous for the kids to play by. 3 out of 4 seats broke. It was only in the sun for part of the day, but I think a sandbox should be able to withstand the elements better since it is always outside! We ended up taking it apart and are going to build our own. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Moore

customer_reviews.title: Complete Crud
customer_reviews.text: This is a joke ....they absolutely did not make this well and it will either break while you assemble it or will break shortly thereafter from normal wear and tear. Do yourself a favor ....go to home depot or Lowes and buy a couple of 2x6's and just screw them together...not only better but cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good sandbox but take extra measures!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big but not very durable! Purchased this in June 2018 and by August wood split and warped on the seats! and wood looks really old. I really like this sand box looks great and the kids have a lot of room to play! I highly recommend using Thompson’s water seal as soon as you put this together! I applied mine to late!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: This sandbox looks nice but there is no way to keep sand dry
customer_reviews.text: This sandbox looks nice but there is no way to keep sand dry. The mesh cover that comes with it is useless and not waterproof so we purchased a tarp with beachball in middle as some customers suggested but the rain weighs tarp down, pockets in tarp and eventually soaks the sand so we now have a mud box. This sandbox will only work if you live in the desert.This sandbox needs to come with a wooden or plastic fitted cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Sandbox is OK but the cover is not.
customer_reviews.text: We bought a used box like this and it was fine until someone backed over it. Instead of repairing it, we decided to go ahead and buy a new one just like it. The box is fine but the cover is nearly worthless. It doesn't cover the whole box, lets the rain in, and after just a couple times of putting the cover on an off, the ties started breaking off.
customer_reviews.author: momflack

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Sadly one of the corner pieces split in half after less than 5 months of moderate use (a couple times a week in a dry, moderate climate). The whole point of spending $ on this simple wooden box was that it should be functional. I’d recommend an inexpensive raised garden bed kit instead of this.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this sandbox for great for a few weeks! The wood on ALL 4 of the corner seats began to split after only a few weeks. My daughter is 2 and not even 25 lbs! Slowly over the first two months every corner completely split and broke, leaving screws exposed. We removed the screws for safety. My daughter still enjoys playing it the sandbox, but I wouldn’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Little less then expected in quality
customer_reviews.text: the wood benches on the cornors had Glue all over them on cracks that split , the inner seat bolts popped out and I had to make my own. the bench seats are great for small kids but defiantly not sturdy to hold anything more then 50lbs or it will break or sooner since mine came with broken split /glued seats.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Sandbox for small children.
customer_reviews.text: The sandbox was easy to assemble and seems to be durable. It was disappointing that no material was supplied for the bottom to hold in the sand. The fabric cover did not fit which was designed to keep out small animals and leaves, etc. There is nothing to keep out the rain water if you so desire. We had to provide our own top and bottom.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: No wood bottom. The bottom is plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not usually one to write a review but you should be sure to realize this sandbox does not have a wooden bottom. The bottom provided is a thick piece of plastic. It’s possible this could work out great for some people. But Based on where we wanted to place this it’s not great for us. Also envisioning loads of sand on the ground should it rip, tear or come loose. The product description provides information that a plastic liner is included. Would have been ideal for the description to acknowledge the bottom will be plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sandbox fun
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. All the necessary tools and hardware came with it. I put about 18 bags (50# each) in and that filled it about half way up the 8" side walls. It come with a heavy plastic bottom with some drainage holes, but if you have heavy rain, you probably want to cover it with a tarp since it takes a couple days to dry out otherwise with just the netting.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce C

customer_reviews.title: Find another sandbox to buy
customer_reviews.text: This is made very cheaply and the cover does not fit. Find another sandbox to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Barron

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cover
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Kids love it (4.5yo and 2.5yo). My only issue is four hours after setting it up one of the ties for the cover came off when I tried to tie it. The cover doesn't actually cover the whole thing there are gaps, it is mesh so really wont keep animals out. I added cinnamon to the sand to keep bugs out.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. It is easy to assemble. Love that is has a cover to keep critters out when not using it. It's the perfect size and has a place to sit on besides the sand. He loves to play in it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase. Great price for a box this size
customer_reviews.text: Great size for four children: three are age 1 and one is age 2. They all fit great in it at the same time and it has provided lots of fun! Used 25 50 pound bags. That filled it about 2/3I I use a large tarp over it at night and anchor it down with some bricks. Works fine.
customer_reviews.author: easyshopping

customer_reviews.title: We've had this less one year and I feel like it's already in bad shape
customer_reviews.text: We've had this less one year and I feel like it's already in bad shape. The cover isn't really worth anything, and the sand will not dry in there if it gets wet at all (which it will with the mesh cover). That said, it's huge and my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tamar Oded

customer_reviews.title: great sand box
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. My grand kids are crazy about this. We put it were there is always shade. I'd buy it again and again. They can also sit on the corners which have little seats. Big enough for adult to get in and get sandy playing the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ranza

customer_reviews.title: B-
customer_reviews.text: It is stable and very easy to assemble. If it takes you an 1.5 to 2 hours to assemble your doing it wrong. Only thing I didn't like is that the mesh doesn't cover what it claims it claims it does. I will have to buy a separate tarp. the dimension of sandbox 59" x 59.13" make it difficult to find a cover that will fit properly. a 150 CM x 150 CM wont cover it as the 59.13 side is to big.
customer_reviews.author: Brazilian80

customer_reviews.title: Complete Set-up
customer_reviews.text: Nice little sandbox. Put together in minutes, a nice heavy plastic liner and an overall nice set-up. the little guy loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but overly priced to the extreme
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids love the sand box, but it could be beefed up. Easy to assemble and instructions were clear. The sides are a somewhat thin wood, and the price deserves a more robust result. The bottom plastic was thick and had good drainage holes. The cover is not effective. It does not prevent water from flowing it the box, but does allow it to air out. Small critters (Rabbits) can easily get in along the edges.
customer_reviews.author: LompocTom

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Received with one seat cracked. Whole thing was not well made, so returned. Do not waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: sweet pea mrs. c

customer_reviews.title: Worth it but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and went together fairly easily. The quality if the wood is low and I had to hone out some of the holes to finish putting the box together. Its worth it for the money but definitely could be better.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Not handling weather well
customer_reviews.text: After only 2 weeks it is not wearing well. The wood is starting to warp. If it gets worse I will change my review accordingly you.
customer_reviews.author: J-Rod

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Seems very cheaply made. Basically 4 wooden panels. We didn’t even assemble when we saw how cheap of a product this
customer_reviews.author: glamrsshab

customer_reviews.title: Pretty expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Pretty expensive for what it is. 4 planks, 4 corner seats and a sheet of plastic. I've never used the cover. Easy to assemble. It takes 12 50lb bags to fill
customer_reviews.author: Gervia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Overall the item matched our expectations, very cute design, deep enough, the addition of the cover is helpful too
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sand box
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sand box! Plenty of play area and the corner seats are great! Seemed flimsy upon putting together but seems fine with sand in it. You need 16 bags of play sand to have a good amount of sand though. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: This is most definitely not as pictured. The mesh cover leaves gaps all around. The sandbox isn’t that treated wood color. Looks way cheaper in quality. I’ll be amazed if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sandbox - Quality Cedar
customer_reviews.text: I'm super pleased with this purchase. My grandchildren have already had hours of constructive fun playing in this sandbox. They love it and I do also. Great buy. Great quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Bonny

customer_reviews.title: No way
customer_reviews.text: There is no cover from the rain. It gets rained on and dirty and it becomes unable to be played in
customer_reviews.author: Lily See

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Initial quality review. I was able to assemble it easily. An extra person is definitely helpful but not needed. I had an issue with one of the boards splitting right where bolts go. I used some wood glue to fix it. Not a big deal. My son loves it and is having fun. I will update in a couple of months to see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Im a small woman and easily assembled this alone in about an hour. I wpuld recommend 16 bags of sand for optimum play. I bought a digger fpr my son to play with this and it has provided many hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Ross

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived all banged up and low and behold, there are broken bits of wood inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good for the price. Easy to put together. One of the seats broke after a couple months but other then that it's good
customer_reviews.author: lilyharp

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Maybe A Different Cover For It?
customer_reviews.text: What a great sturdy product! It is super easy to put together my only complaint is the mesh top it comes with to cover it from weather/sun,etc it is a mesh cover that has holes so if you don't want rain getting through to your sand I would invest in a tarp to go on top instead of the mesh cover that is provided.
customer_reviews.author: Living Word Church

customer_reviews.title: Good size and kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this sand box. I put 500 lbs. of sand in it, but it will hold much mores One seat was partially split and another broke when trying to screw it on, so it’s sitting on the screw. Overall I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this but we are still using it
customer_reviews.text: After leaving outside for one winter this started to fall apart. Seats cracked, side boards buckled. Not happy with this but we are still using it. Won’t last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Erin D

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price, good sandbox. Only thing I don't care for is there are wholes in the plastic bottom for drainage. I prefer to cover it with a solid cover so those holes allow some bugs in.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: the frame is okay but the interior plastic insert was not expected as well as the mesh type screen will not protect from rain & critters. expected something completely different. disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sid Siddiqi

customer_reviews.title: Great for Grands
customer_reviews.text: My grandson LOVES his new 'beach' ! It was easy to assemble too! Just exactly as described!
customer_reviews.author: JLu

customer_reviews.title: Good box for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, not as durable as I’d hoped but great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Seems like this was an old product the styrofoam I literally glued itself to the wood but I am very happy with the product my son's love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had the sandbox for 10 days, the sandbox itself has been awesome! But the mesh cover it comes with has broken/torn from trying to put the cover back over the sandbox within the first couple days of having it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhianna

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together and the kids love it but ...
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together and the kids love it but kind of cheap materials for the money .
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great sandbox! My 3 & 6 year old love ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sandbox! My 3 & 6 year old love it. There is plenty of room for 4 kids around these ages. It is a bit difficult to cover, so I plan on using velcro next season. Overall, great purchase. It is a great quality and I can see it lasting for many years!
customer_reviews.author: A-dawg

customer_reviews.title: Just the perfect size for
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. Just the perfect size for her
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: A great wooden 5x5' backyard sandbox.
customer_reviews.text: I feel this is a really good sandbox for the price. It is not made of very thick wood and may appear flimsy at first glance, but in my opinion it is sufficient for backyard use. I do strongly recommend lightly sanding the wood and staining or stealing it before assembling and leveling the sandbox. The cover that is included does not keep out rain so I bought a 5x5 foot cover separately.
customer_reviews.author: Sarin69

customer_reviews.title: simple yet lovely
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a nice sandbox for my almost 2-year-old grandson. This filled the bill quite nicely - it has simple lines, looks great on my deck, but most importantly, has a lot of room for making roads, caves, hills, ponds, etc. AND, the corner seats support this old 54-year-old gramma's frame so I can join in the fun! The cover is very user friendly - really love this sandbox.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda M.

customer_reviews.title: great for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our grandson's first birthday. He loves it and all of his little friends (and the family dog) love playing in it. Well made and a good height for little ones to climb in and out of and a good size for several kids and toys to fit in. The cover did not last long with the dog. She managed to shred it pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: anita

customer_reviews.title: Sandbox is just OK
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cheap...you can tell it wont last long if it gets wet from rain. The net is a good idea but, I didnt think about keeping the rain out...so we had alot of wet sand.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this sandbox
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this sandbox, our grandson loves it and the price was great! I love that it comes with a cover, so when they aren't playing in it, stuff isn't able to get into the sand and mess it up!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: ... this for a couple of years and my Grandkids love it- nice and
customer_reviews.text: we have had this for a couple of years and my Grandkids love it- nice and big
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: Great sandbox! Not the greatest cover.
customer_reviews.text: Great sandbox. Great size. Only flaw was the cover...I ended up cutting a piece of tarp to size with the cover that came with over it...it looks and functions much better now.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: The box is a good size, the corner seats are great
customer_reviews.text: The box is a good size, the corner seats are great, it looks nice, and was easy to put together--even the tool needed was included. I did oil it before putting it together; it didn't seems very weather-resistant. The boards are thinner than I had hoped they will be, so hope they last well. The cover is worthless, I think. None of us will undo 9 velcro strips and 4 ties each time someone wants to play, and then refasten them afterwards, and it didn't go all the way to the sides; I wouldn't trust it with our cats.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Wiebe

customer_reviews.title: The sandbox is large and fairly well-made. However, ...
customer_reviews.text: The sandbox is large and fairly well-made. However, one of the benches arrived cracked. It appears to have cracked in the grain of the wood. We wanted the sandbox available for our 2 year old granddaughter's birthday party so we used it after applying wood glue. Hopefully, it lasts!!
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: The wood came extremely warped. My son helped me ...
customer_reviews.text: The wood came extremely warped. My son helped me build it so I could not take it apart and return it. Very upset
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal...but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sandbox, but I put too much sand in it and now I cannot find my child! Instructions do not tell you what to do in a situation like this. Can anybody help me?
customer_reviews.author: DJ Skidude

customer_reviews.title: awesome product, great seller
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked out great. My grand daughter loves it. I ordered it a week before her birthday and it was here not only in time, but 2 days later. Wow. It's made well and I would highly recommend it to anyone that's in the market.
customer_reviews.author: mike creswell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my granddaughter loves it - so I love it - well built
customer_reviews.author: Formula697

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Do not pick up by the seats. Will break Easy to assemble and fill. Perfect size for older toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: LINDSAY CARPENTER

customer_reviews.title: As the grandmother, I sat on one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: As the grandmother, I sat on one of the seats and it broke off. Be ready to buy A LOT of sand too.
customer_reviews.author: suemac

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent little sandbox. Came without any hardware which was fun, but decent overall
customer_reviews.author: Scott McCumber

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars since they sent us 2 of the same sides but my husband made it work. It’s a really nice sand box and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big - even my 8yo can play easily
customer_reviews.author: mamasubers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! easily assembled, lasts, strong sturdy construction and took a whole lot of sand to fill!
customer_reviews.author: beach girl

customer_reviews.title: it is easy and very attractive looking
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and pondered for weeks before purchasing this item for my kids. Upon initial setup, it is easy and very attractive looking... However only 3 months into use, the seats are breaking down, the bottom (which is just a clear plastic cloth) has gave into the weeds and grass underneath and now my sandbox looks like a raised flower bed. This thing is awful! I would not recommend buying it for anyone! It does not come with a rain/waterproof cover and therefore when it does rain, it cannot be used for days! I don't think I have ever regretted a purchase more...
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Cover should be bigger, nice and large for multiple kids to play in
customer_reviews.author: cheryl krumbein

customer_reviews.title: Size is right for my 2 kids. I filled ...
customer_reviews.text: Size is right for my 2 kids. I filled it with 17 bags of play sand from Lowes at 50lbs each. I had to re-drill a few of the holes on one side, but everything seems to hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Murphy

customer_reviews.title: has a bad chemical odor
customer_reviews.text: Well overpriced, has a bad chemical odor, but works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Inno

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift not as sturdy as i thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: My Experience

customer_reviews.title: The sand box with the supplied plastic foil is good. The mesh cover is a joke
customer_reviews.text: The sand box with the supplied plastic foil is good. The mesh cover is a joke: too small! it really doesn't match the sand box, so no use for this
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: ... the seats had supports under them as not very sturdy otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: Wish the seats had supports under them as not very sturdy otherwise great. Cover not fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This product works perfect for our grandkid's. they enjoy playing in it. also was easy to put together. It was sturdier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: slvreclipse98

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this and I love the seats so I can play with them without actually sitting in the sand!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Stricker

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this sandbox! So far its sturdy and haven't had any problems!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.  Less then an hour.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandkids ages 7 and 5. It was super easy to put together by myself. It seams very sturdy and I can’t wait to show them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to put togather
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old grandson loves it. he can sit in the sand or on the corner. there is lots of space to play. it was easy to put togather.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Burris

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This sandbox has been so much fun for the kids! It's also a nice looking sandbox so it doesn't clash with our yard decor.
customer_reviews.author: cecilia

customer_reviews.title: great sandbox
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 year old grandson. Very easy to put together-in fact he did alot of the work. Sturdy and roomy enough for most of his construction toys. Has played in it for hours-loves the feel of sand under bare feet. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Grandma3

customer_reviews.title: Meh.....
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and looked like the picture. I thought for the price it wasn't as sturdy as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Parent of young child

customer_reviews.title: Good product but small cover.
customer_reviews.text: Good product in general but the cover is smaller than what is shown on the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Ying

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Love this sandbox, perfect size for my 3 and 5 year old, plenty of space for both to play. Only wish it had cover, using a tarp to protect from cats but doesn't work that well.
customer_reviews.author: W. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to play in and nice sits in corners
customer_reviews.text: It was just what we wanted and it is made well. Perfect size to play in and nice sits in corners. Plenty of room for lots of friends.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for $100 and such an amazing size. I would definitely recommend the 6x6 tarp.
customer_reviews.author: ADVH

customer_reviews.title: Great larger box with all necessities
customer_reviews.text: Great option for kids. Nice corner seating areas for adults. Has a permeable liner for under the sand. Easy to put together and holds a lot of sand. 15 bags from homedepot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sandbox!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks nice, love the mesh cover, my grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Kidkraft Backyard Sandbox
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and altho I did not see it personally, I was told that it is all that I expected of it. Yes I would recommend it to others.It is large enough for several children and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The sand box itself is great, I was disappointed with how the cover fit.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal

customer_reviews.title: Good and economical sandbox
customer_reviews.text: This is the second sandbox I ordered for different sets of Grandchildren. The first was two years ago and those children still play in it everyday! It is large enough for four good sized children and easy to put together. I think the price even went down over the last two years. When I needed a second sandbox, I look for this exact same one!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L.

customer_reviews.title: Built and ready to use!
customer_reviews.text: Great materials, well-constructed, easy to assemble. Product does not have a hard bottom, as mentioned in other reviews, however, it does come with a plastic sheet which attaches to contain sand granules and prevent leakage. Separate tarp purchase is not required.
customer_reviews.author: pd

customer_reviews.title: The corner seats do not seem like they will make it more than a year without ...
customer_reviews.text: Thickness of the wood could be an issue. The corner seats do not seem like they will make it more than a year without cracking or breaking.
customer_reviews.author: psuchad

customer_reviews.title: Good size, well made
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this sandbox and choose a shady spot in the garden which my 3-year old loves!
customer_reviews.author: Tanja Van Wie

product_meta.title: KidKraft Wooden Backyard Sandbox with Built-in Corner Seating and Mesh Cover - Honey
product_meta.description:
The Kid Kraft backyard sandbox gives kids a perfect place to build sandcastles, dig for treasure and play with all of their favorite sand toys. With built-in seating, there is plenty of room for kids to play together. The weather-resistant wood and durable finish look great. And when playtime is over, the included mesh cover fits over the top to protect the sand.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Our Backyard Sandbox gives kids a perfect place to build sandcastles, dig for treasure and play with all of their favorite sand toys. Parents will love watching their kids have so much fun without even leaving the backyard. Large enough that multiple children can play at once. Smart, sturdy construction. Reinforced wooden panels prevent warping and weathering. Packaged with detailed, step-by-step assembly instructions.
feature_bullets: Mesh cover for when sandbox is not in use
Large enough that multiple children can play at once
Reinforced wooden panels prevent warping and weathering
Packaged with detailed, step-by-step assembly instructions
